message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this product to you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on a high-quality item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you're willing to negotiate. I'm interested, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'd be willing to pay $10,500. Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still looking to get a good deal for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $11,500. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
